title: HBO Max expanding to 15 new European countries next month, but not the UK
content:
Streaming service HBO Max is set to expand to 15 new European countries next month, bringing the total to 61 regions across the globe.

As first reported by Reuters, WarnerMedia has been slowly rolling out the service to additional countries, with the goal of being available in 190 regions by 2026.

more…

The post HBO Max expanding to 15 new European countries next month, but not the UK appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Streaming service HBO Max is set to expand to 15 new European countries next month, being finally available in 61 regions across the globe.
